mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reservations r LEFT JOIN users u ON r.user_code = u.user_code LEFT JOIN branchs rl ON r.rental_location = rl.branch_code LEFT JOIN rental_cars rc ON r.car_code = rc.car_code LEFT JOIN car_types ct ON rc.car_type_code = ct.car_type_code

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reservations r JOIN users u ON r.user_code = u.user_code JOIN rental_cars rc ON r.car_code = rc.car_code JOIN car_types ct ON rc.car_type_code = ct.car_type_code JOIN branchs rl ON r.rental_location = rl.branch_code WHERE 1=1
AND u.user_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userName}, '%')
AND rl.branch_name = #{branchName}
AND r.rental_date = DATE_FORMAT(#{rentalDate}, '%Y%m%d')

SELECT r.reservation_code AS reservationCode, u.user_name AS userName, u.user_birth_date AS userBirthDate, u.user_phone_number AS phoneNumber, u.user_email AS userEmail, u.driver_license_number AS driverLicense, u.license_issue_date AS driverIssue, -- 면허 발급일 u.license_expiry_date AS driverExpiry, rl.branch_name AS branchName, ct.car_type_name AS carType, rc.car_number AS carNumber, cc_insurance.common_name AS insuranceType, DATE_FORMAT(r.rental_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS rentalDate, TIME_FORMAT(r.rental_time, '%H:%i') AS rentalTime, DATE_FORMAT(r.return_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS returnDate, TIME_FORMAT(r.return_time, '%H:%i') AS returnTime, CONCAT( 'Rental Period: ', DATE_FORMAT(r.rental_date, '%Y-%m-%d'), -- 포맷팅 추가 ' to ', DATE_FORMAT(r.return_date, '%Y-%m-%d'), -- 포맷팅 추가 ' (', DATEDIFF(r.return_date, r.rental_date), ' days)' ) AS rentalPeriod, cc_payment_category.common_name AS paymentCategoryName, cc_payment_type.common_name AS paymentTypeName, r.payment_amount AS paymentAmount FROM reservations r JOIN users u ON r.user_code = u.user_code JOIN rental_cars rc ON r.car_code = rc.car_code JOIN car_types ct ON rc.car_type_code = ct.car_type_code JOIN branchs rl ON r.rental_location = rl.branch_code LEFT JOIN common_codes cc_insurance ON r.insurance_type = cc_insurance.common_code AND cc_insurance.common_kind_code = 'insurance_type' LEFT JOIN common_codes cc_payment_category ON r.payment_category = cc_payment_category.common_code AND cc_payment_category.common_kind_code = 'payment_category' LEFT JOIN common_codes cc_payment_type ON r.payment_type = cc_payment_type.common_code AND cc_payment_type.common_kind_code = CASE WHEN r.payment_category = '1' THEN 'payment_type_card' WHEN r.payment_category = '2' THEN 'payment_type_pay' ELSE NULL END WHERE r.reservation_code = #{reservationCode}
